comment.body: За что люблю ZeroNet - так это за отсутствие анонимности в смысле классических имиджборд: здесь у каждого есть свой айдишник, по которому можно скрывать, банить, и так далее. К сожалению, "можно" это пока что только в теории, практически нигде пока не реализовано, кроме минимального варианта в ZeroMe+.
Man, all things you are doing work for me. Check out screenshot on my page. Maybe it's a problem with your browser or something like this?

@Flyman: Previous time I opened your site from start it was "Courier New". When I open it now it's "Lucida Console". To switch fonts I've opened developer tools (F12, right on the screenshot), found CSS rule and changed it, and then done screenshots with 3 different fonts (Lucida, Courier and default). It's really weird it's rendered correctly for everyone except you. Maybe some cache issue?

@Flyman: Check this https://jsfiddle.net/urk5u9xa/ Does it work for you or all 3 lines are the same font? If it's ok, then it's not problem with browser, only with one page. Otherwise, I'd try to google something like "fonts .. not working in ..".
@Flyman: I'd try to reset chrome settings, or probably start new user profile.

Как жаль! Такие талантливые ребята были...
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bpp8bHn0Yu8
